long_description: Taking a kite with you on all your adventures just got easier-and lighter-thanks to the Stowaway Diamond! Kite packs down small into 14 x 4-inch travel pouch, making it ideal for backpacks, pockets or picnic baskets. Colorful ripstop nylon sail is both tough and light for long-lasting performance; flies best in winds between 4 and 15 miles per hour. 6.75 ft. ripstop nylon tail adds stability and visual appeal. Collapsible fiberglass rod frame is lightweight yet tough enough to withstand the abuses of first-time pilots or unplanned landings. Instructions are printed directly onto the nylon travel pouch; sets up for flight in a matter of seconds. Package includes kite, tail, travel pouch, winder handle and string.
short_description: Taking a kite with you on all your adventures just got easier-and lighter-thanks to the Stowaway Diamond!
